casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Sidney WADE Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 18, 2018

John C. Drapp III, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Jennifer F. Miller, deputy assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 178 Conn. App. 459, 175 A.3d 1284 (2017), is denied.
